One of the best parts of non-WiFi monitors is how simple they are. Plug them in, turn them on‚Äîdone. No app downloads, no firmware updates, no cloud sync.

VOX stands for ‚ÄúVoice Operated Exchange.‚Äù It means the screen turns on only when noise is detected‚Äîsaving power and minimizing screen time.
